task.title: How To Use the Document Camera

taskbody.context:
This task will teach you how to use the Document Camera that is included in the complimentary classroom package.
The document camera functions as a projector for physical documents such as books, papers or journal articles. If you cannot find the article online, but want to show the entire class, this is the tool to use.
The Camera looks something like the figure below, and is positioned at the front of the classroom on the desk.
Please see Classroom Rules Page for best practices with regard to the machines.
Figure 4: Document Camera

step.cmd: Press the power button on the base of the camera
Press the camera button on the tablet that you used to turn on the projector
Lay the document flat on the base of the document camera, and be sure that it is right side up
Observe the screen behind you, and adjust brightness if necessary
